title: Exercise 3-2
description: What fraction of WD customers are also customers of WBH?

questions.name: fraction_wd_wbh
questions.title: What fraction of WD customers are also customers of WBH? (Enter a decimal value)

validators.text: Please enter a value between 0.704 and 0.705.

questions.description: WD and WBH have 93 customers in common, and WD has 132 customers in all, so the percentage of WD customers who are customers of WBH is 93/132Ã—100%% = 70.45%%.
